mapper.update: update db_outbound set PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVENUMBER = #{savenumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTBOUNDNUM = #{outboundnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, SAVENUMBER, ORDERNUM, OPER, OPERTIME, OUTBOUNDNUM, NOTES from db_outbound where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, SAVENUMBER, ORDERNUM, OPER, OPERTIME, OUTBOUNDNUM, NOTES from db_outbound
